collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (3 total Queries, 3 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `ed`.`id`, `ed`.`code`, `ed`.`est_start_date`, `ed`.`est_end_date`, `ed`.`start_date`, `ed`.`end_date`, `ed`.`origin`, `ed`.`created_at`, `ed`.`created_by`, `p`.`name` as `project_name`, `d`.`name` as `discipline_name`, `dr`.`name` as `doc_revision`, `dp`.`name` as `doc_purpose`, `edr`.`version_number`, `dt`.`name` as `doc_type`, `ed`.`verify_status`, `ed`.`approve_status`, `ds`.`code` as `status_code`, `ds`.`name` as `status_name`, `ds1`.`code` as `approve_code`, `ds1`.`name` as `approve_name` FROM `edms_documents` `ed` LEFT JOIN `projects` `p` ON `p`.`id` = `ed`.`project_id` LEFT JOIN `edms_document_revisions` `edr` ON `edr`.`id` = `ed`.`edms_document_revision_id` LEFT JOIN `disciplines` `d` ON `d`.`id` = `ed`.`discipline_id` LEFT JOIN `document_types` `dt` ON `dt`.`id` = `ed`.`document_type_id` LEFT JOIN `document_revisions` `dr` ON `dr`.`id` = `edr`.`document_revision_id` LEFT JOIN `document_purposes` `dp` ON `dp`.`id` = `edr`.`document_purpose_id` LEFT JOIN `document_status` `ds` ON `ds`.`id` = `ed`.`verify_status` LEFT JOIN `document_status` `ds1` ON `ds1`.`id` = `ed`.`approve_status` WHERE `ed`.`deleted_at` IS NULL ORDER BY `ed`.`created_at` DESC LIMIT 10

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `ed`.`id`, `ed`.`code`, `ed`.`est_start_date`, `ed`.`est_end_date`, `ed`.`start_date`, `ed`.`end_date`, `ed`.`origin`, `ed`.`created_at`, `ed`.`created_by`, `p`.`name` as `project_name`, `d`.`name` as `discipline_name`, `dr`.`name` as `doc_revision`, `dp`.`name` as `doc_purpose`, `edr`.`version_number`, `dt`.`name` as `doc_type`, `ed`.`verify_status`, `ed`.`approve_status`, `ds`.`code` as `status_code`, `ds`.`name` as `status_name`, `ds1`.`code` as `approve_code`, `ds1`.`name` as `approve_name` FROM `edms_documents` `ed` LEFT JOIN `projects` `p` ON `p`.`id` = `ed`.`project_id` LEFT JOIN `edms_document_revisions` `edr` ON `edr`.`id` = `ed`.`edms_document_revision_id` LEFT JOIN `disciplines` `d` ON `d`.`id` = `ed`.`discipline_id` LEFT JOIN `document_types` `dt` ON `dt`.`id` = `ed`.`document_type_id` LEFT JOIN `document_revisions` `dr` ON `dr`.`id` = `edr`.`document_revision_id` LEFT JOIN `document_purposes` `dp` ON `dp`.`id` = `edr`.`document_purpose_id` LEFT JOIN `document_status` `ds` ON `ds`.`id` = `ed`.`verify_status` LEFT JOIN `document_status` `ds1` ON `ds1`.`id` = `ed`.`approve_status` WHERE `ed`.`deleted_at` IS NULL ORDER BY `ed`.`created_at` DESC LIMIT 10
